title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/agatha_lagutin.html
notes:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I have swore the oath of allegiance. I am very happy
and greatful for your willingness to assist me on 
the transaction.

Mr. P. Lagutin

messages.subject: FROM PETER LAGUTIN
messages.body:
Received: 	from unknown (HELO localhst2759.com) (83.110.142.39)


Dear Sir,
I am PETER LAGUTIN and I represent Mr. Mikhail
Khordokovsky the former C.E.O of Yukos Oil Company in
Russia. I have a very sensitive and confidential brief
from this top (oligarch) to ask for your partnership
in re-profiling funds over US$250 million. I will give
the details, but in summary, the funds are coming via
Bank Menatep. 

This is a legitimate transaction. You will be paid 10%
for your "management fees". If you are interested,
please write back by email= lpn2005@luxmail.com  
<mailto:lqn2005@hotmail.com > and provide me with your 
confidential telephone number, fax number and email
address and I will provide further details and
instructions. 

Please keep this confidential; we can't afford more
political problems. Finally, please note that this
must be concluded within two weeks. Please write back
promptly.I will also suggest you visit these news
sites on the internet to be better informed
about this project.
http://www.winne.com/topinterviews/khodorkovsky.htm
http://newsfromrussia.com/main/2003/11/13/51215.html
http://www.supportmbk.com/mbk/mbk_bio.cfm
http://www.disinfopedia.org/wiki.phtml?title=Mikhail_B._Khodorkovsky
http://www.pbs.org/frontlineworld/stories/moscow/khodorkovskyinterview.html
http://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/75/2004/LIR.jhtml?passListIdu&passYear
04&passListType=Person&uniqueId=M1IF&datatype=Person
http://mikhail_khodorkovsky_society.blogspot.com/
Write me back. I look forward to it.
Regards
Mr. PETER LAGUTIN
messages.raw:
PETER LAGUTIN

Received: from unknown (HELO localhst2759.com) (83.110.142.39)
From: "MR PETER LAGUTIN" <lpn2005@luxmail.com>

Subject: FROM PETER LAGUTIN

Dear Sir,
I am PETER LAGUTIN and I represent Mr. Mikhail Khordokovsky the former C.E.O of Yukos Oil Company in Russia. I have a very sensitive and confidential brief from this top (oligarch) to ask for your partnership in re-profiling funds over US$250 million. I will give the details, but in summary, the funds are coming via Bank Menatep.

This is a legitimate transaction. You will be paid 10% for your "management fees". If you are interested, please write back by email= lpn2005@luxmail.com <mailto:lqn2005@hotmail.com > and provide me with your confidential telephone number, fax number and email address and I will provide further details and instructions.

Please keep this confidential; we can't afford more political problems. Finally, please note that this must be concluded within two weeks. Please write back promptly.I will also suggest you visit these news sites on the internet to be better informed about this project.
http://www.winne.com/topinterviews/khodorkovsky.htm

Write me back. I look forward to it.
Regards
Mr. PETER LAGUTIN

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Lagutin,

I am slightly unsettled that you obtained my confidential,
personal e-mail address. I am Lady Agatha Bristol,
CBE, and I am Head of Special Operations at Her
Majesty's Foreign Office.

How may I help you? Keep in mind that you are dealing with a senior government official, tied by certain ethical considerations.

Yours sincerely,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

Dear Mr. Lagutin,

I am slightly unsettled that you obtained my confidential, personal e-mail address. I am Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE, and I am Head of Special Operations at Her Majesty's Foreign Office.

How may I help you? Keep in mind that you are dealing with a senior government official, tied by certain ethical considerations.

Yours sincerely,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,
  
  
  Thanks for your quick response. This is to
  acknowledge the receipt of your 
  mail.I promise that you will never regret your
  association with me and you are going to benefit
  immensely from this transaction.
  
  All I need from you is sincerity of purpose and
  dedicated honesty to enable me confides to you the
  required trust necessary for the success of this
  transaction. You have to understand that this is
 the
  genesis of our business relationship.
  
  
  1. That the Modus operandi of getting this fund is
  simple. The fund at the moment is in Bank Menatep,
  waiting for my directives where they will ship it
 to
  under diplomatic arrangement to their
 correspondent
  bank/finance company where you will confidently
  receive the funds either of the following
 countries:
  SWITZERLAND, BELGIUM, SPAIN. You may travel to
 clear
  the funds if you desire to be present to meet with
  the bank/finance company or you may be in your
  country and open an online account with this
  bank/finance company and receive the money there
 in
  your country.
  
  
  2. That, you have to feel free as this money is no
  drug related money or any illicit related money.
  This is clean money.
  
  3. Shotly, I will send to you by email or fax all
  the relevant information concerning the funds on
 its
  arrival to any of the above countries of your
 choice
  after i must have received your response, to
 enable
  you follow up.
  
  4. I will issue a Power of Attorney and transfer
  code of the funds. I need your full name which I
  will attach to the funds to it's arrival in any of
  the above countries.
  
  Respond quickly
  
  Regards,
  
  Mr. Peter Lagutin
messages.raw:
PETER LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Thanks for your quick response. This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail.I promise that you will never regret your association with me and you are going to benefit immensely from this transaction.

All I need from you is sincerity of purpose and dedicated honesty to enable me confides to you the required trust necessary for the success of this transaction. You have to understand that this is the genesis of our business relationship.

1. That the Modus operandi of getting this fund is simple. The fund at the moment is in Bank Menatep, waiting for my directives where they will ship it to under diplomatic arrangement to their correspondent bank/finance company where you will confidently receive the funds either of the following countries: SWITZERLAND, BELGIUM, SPAIN. You may travel to clear the funds if you desire to be present to meet with the bank/finance company or you may be in your country and open an online account with this bank/finance company and receive the money there in your country.

2. That, you have to feel free as this money is no drug related money or any illicit related money. This is clean money.

3. Shotly, I will send to you by email or fax all the relevant information concerning the funds on its arrival to any of the above countries of your choice after i must have received your response, to enable you follow up.

4. I will issue a Power of Attorney and transfer code of the funds. I need your full name which I will attach to the funds to it's arrival in any of the above countries.

Respond quickly

Regards,

Mr. Peter Lagutin

messages.body:
Dear Mr Lagutin,

Firstly, please address me as Lady Agatha.

I also take exception to the tone of your message. Do
you know who I am? I am in charge of Her Majesty's
Special Operations at the Foreign Office. I am in
charge of an eight-figure budget and I have dozens of
agents under my command. 

Do not order me around, Lagutin. I've dealt with
malcontents who, if you'll pardon the ghastly American
vernacular, could eat you for breakfast.

Now if you would please be so kind as to moderate your
language and send me the paperwork, that would be
appreciated.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

Date: 29 Mar 2005

Dear Mr Lagutin,

Firstly, please address me as Lady Agatha.

I also take exception to the tone of your message. Do you know who I am? I am in charge of Her Majesty's Special Operations at the Foreign Office. I am in charge of an eight-figure budget and I have dozens of agents under my command.

Do not order me around, Lagutin. I've dealt with malcontents who, if you'll pardon the ghastly American vernacular, could eat you for breakfast.

Now if you would please be so kind as to moderate your language and send me the paperwork, that would be appreciated.

messages.body:
Dear Agatha,
  
 Thanks for your quick response. The document you
 need from me is just a power of attorney, transfer
 code of the funds and the full details of the
 bank/finance company where you will receive the
 money from.
  
 Send to me immediately, your private tel/fax number
 for easy communication to enable me send you
 document and give you details of the bank where you
 will receive the funds from.
  
 Note: Keep this transaction very confidential for
 security and safety reasons. Respond with the above
 details, while i am making my arrangement to move
 the funds out to a bank/finance company in Europe.
  
 Mr. Peter Lagutin
messages.raw:
PETER LAGUTIN

Dear Agatha,

Thanks for your quick response. The document you need from me is just a power of attorney, transfer code of the funds and the full details of the bank/finance company where you will receive the money from.

Send to me immediately, your private tel/fax number for easy communication to enable me send you document and give you details of the bank where you will receive the funds from.

Note: Keep this transaction very confidential for security and safety reasons. Respond with the above details, while i am making my arrangement to move the funds out to a bank/finance company in Europe.

Mr. Peter Lagutin

messages.body:
April 7

Dear Mr. Lagutin,

It has been a while since we had the pleasure of one
of your missives; what is going on with this
transaction?

Please do get back to me - we are ready to proceed if
you are.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 7

Dear Mr. Lagutin,

It has been a while since we had the pleasure of one of your missives; what is going on with this transaction?

Please do get back to me - we are ready to proceed if you are.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Aghata Bristol,

Thanks for your mail. I am working on how to move
the funds out of the bank menatep to a bank in Spain
where you will receive the funds from by opening an
online account with the bank, to make this whole
transaction very confidential for security and
safety reasons.

The funds will eave the bank menatep to the bank in
Europe today on your name LADY AGHATA BRISTOL as the
beneficiary. You will receive a power of attorney
and the transfer code of the funds from me on Monday
and i will also give you a full details of the bank
in Spain for you to contact directly. 

Please send to me your most private tel/fax number.

Mr. Yuriy
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Aghata Bristol,

Thanks for your mail. I am working on how to move the funds out of the bank menatep to a bank in Spain where you will receive the funds from by opening an online account with the bank, to make this whole transaction very confidential for security and safety reasons.

The funds will eave the bank menatep to the bank in Europe today on your name LADY AGHATA BRISTOL as the beneficiary. You will receive a power of attorney and the transfer code of the funds from me on Monday and i will also give you a full details of the bank in Spain for you to contact directly.

Please send to me your most private tel/fax number.

Mr. Yuriy

messages.body:
April 8

Dear Mr Lagutin,

Thank you for your note. Do spell my name properly,
there's a good chap.

I also note that your name was Peter Lagutin when we
last corresponded. What is going on?

Please get back to me - we are starting to have
concerns about this business.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 8

Dear Mr Lagutin,

Thank you for your note. Do spell my name properly, there's a good chap.

I also note that your name was Peter Lagutin when we last corresponded. What is going on?

Please get back to me - we are starting to have concerns about this business.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Thanks for your quick response My name is Peter
Lagutin but my Native name is (YURIY). Send to me
your private tel/fax number and your mailing
address, to enable me start documentation on your
name and send to you.

Please send the above details very important for us
to move ahead on this transaction.

Mr. Lagutin
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Thanks for your quick response My name is Peter Lagutin but my Native name is (YURIY). Send to me your private tel/fax number and your mailing address, to enable me start documentation on your name and send to you.

Please send the above details very important for us to move ahead on this transaction.

Mr. Lagutin

messages.body:
April 10


My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your note, and for clearing up your
little identity crisis.

We are more than happy to proceed with this
transaction. However, you must remember that you are
dealing with Her Majesty's Foreign Office. Therefore,
we shall require you to take a Temporary Oath of
Allegiance to Her Majesty, which will bind you to the
Official Secrets Act.

Nothing to worry about, old fruit. We just need to
know that we can trust you, and to give you what you
truly deserve.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 10

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your note, and for clearing up your little identity crisis.

We are more than happy to proceed with this transaction. However, you must remember that you are dealing with Her Majesty's Foreign Office. Therefore, we shall require you to take a Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty, which will bind you to the Official Secrets Act.

Nothing to worry about, old fruit. We just need to know that we can trust you, and to give you what you truly deserve.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Thanks for your understanding. I am ready to take
the oath of allegiance between both parties, because
I'm very serious about confidentiality in this whole
transaction. 

How do we take the oath of allegiance. I am ready
and waiting.

I also request for your private tel/fax number and
your address for easy communication and top enable
me send you power of attorney and the transfer code
of the funds immediately it is moved.

Mr. peter Lagutin.
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Thanks for your understanding. I am ready to take the oath of allegiance between both parties, because I'm very serious about confidentiality in this whole transaction.

How do we take the oath of allegiance. I am ready and waiting.

I also request for your private tel/fax number and your address for easy communication and top enable me send you power of attorney and the transfer code of the funds immediately it is moved.

Mr. peter Lagutin.

messages.body:
April 11

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your e-mail. It is a pleasure to hear
from you.

We are delighted that you are prepared to take the
Oath of Allegiance.

Please print out the following text, along with a
photograph, sign it and send the completed document
back to me. You may wish to recite it with your right
hand over your heart before you do so.

Here is the text:

'WHEREAS, I, Peter Lagutin, on this day
.................. do by humble merkin solemnly swear
to assist Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II in all
matters associated with and relevant to, her Right
Royal Business. Pro Vom Poppadom'.

We look forward to receiving your completed Oath. Then
we can move on and give you what you truly deserve.

As ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 11

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your e-mail. It is a pleasure to hear from you.

We are delighted that you are prepared to take the Oath of Allegiance.

Please print out the following text, along with a photograph, sign it and send the completed document back to me. You may wish to recite it with your right hand over your heart before you do so.

Here is the text:

'WHEREAS, I, Peter Lagutin, on this day .................. do by humble merkin solemnly swear to assist Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II in all matters associated with and relevant to, her Right Royal Business. Pro Vom Poppadom'.

We look forward to receiving your completed Oath. Then we can move on and give you what you truly deserve.

As ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I just received oath of allegiance. i will print it
out fill it and swear the oath and return it back to
you as an attachment to enable us start this
transaction well.


Mr. P. Lagutin
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I just received oath of allegiance. i will print it out fill it and swear the oath and return it back to you as an attachment to enable us start this transaction well.

Mr. P. Lagutin

April 12


My dear Lagutin,

Excellent, old boy.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 12

My dear Lagutin,

Excellent, old boy.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I am out of my station. When i return back by Monday
i will fill and send you the aoth of allegiance.

Mr. P. Lagutin
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I am out of my station. When i return back by Monday i will fill and send you the aoth of allegiance.

Mr. P. Lagutin

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your e-mail. 

We look forward to receiving your completed Oath of
Allegiance.

LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 16

My dear Lagutin,

We look forward to receiving your completed Oath of Allegiance.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I will be back in my station tomorrow Wednesday.
Upon my arrival i will send you the signed oath to
enable us move ahead.

Mr. p. Lagutin
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I will be back in my station tomorrow Wednesday. Upon my arrival i will send you the signed oath to enable us move ahead.

Mr. p. Lagutin

messages.body:
April 19


My dear Lagutin,

Please do hurry old thing - time is not ours to waste.

Yours,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE

April 19

My dear Lagutin,

Please do hurry old thing - time is not ours to waste.

Yours,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

OATH OBTAINED!

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Have you received attached file? My origin is South
Africa. 

Mr. Lagutin
messages.raw:
LAGUTIN

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Have you received attached file? My origin is South Africa.

Mr. Lagutin

messages.body:
My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your note.

Yes, we have received it and shall give it the
scrutiny it deserves
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your note.

Yes, we have received it and shall give it the scrutiny it deserves

messages.body:
My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your Oath.

There is a problem, however, and I must admit to have
made a slight error. We always ask for the Oath to be
completed in the taker's native tongue.

We should like a new Oath in Russian. I am terribly
sorry about this, old thing, but it has to be done.

If you could oblige us in this matter we shall make
sure you get what you truly deserve.

As ever, 

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA

My dear Lagutin,

Thank you for your Oath.

There is a problem, however, and I must admit to have made a slight error. We always ask for the Oath to be completed in the taker's native tongue.

We should like a new Oath in Russian. I am terribly sorry about this, old thing, but it has to be done.

If you could oblige us in this matter we shall make sure you get what you truly deserve.

As ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

[Since the Lads are about as Russian as plantain, this should be interesting.]
